job_title: Certified Recovery Specialist in Medford, OR
pros: Great people with a passion for recovery
cons: Limited client access due to heightened COVID restrictions

review_title: Great entry level job for someone who is passionate about recovery and changing lives
pros: Opportunity for personal growth, very fulfilling if you like helping people overcome obstacles such as homelessness, addiction, traumas
cons: The burnout can hit hard and the compensation could be much better for the amount of emotional resources this job requires

review_title: Loved my co-workers, everyone was important
job_title: Medical Records Assistant in Medford, OR
pros: Everyone & every job is important here. Amazing people, I loved every one of my co-workers - it's like a big family. The most welcoming atmosphere I've ever worked in.
cons: Not sure what to put here.

review_title: Ingalls ARC was a hectic 'health care' environment. Employees and clients were not valued...only making $$$.
pros: Staff learned how to work together with very little and inconsistent direction from Proctor.
cons: Lack of clinically sound leadership. Not staffed properly to adequately treat clients. Staff treated poorly by mgmt...expected to skip breaks and work extra hours. Highly dysfunctional work environment.

pros: Good bosses, great vaca and sick pay
cons: Inability to advance even though im certified
